trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000010_GILGAMESH<tab>To my side, Enkidu! The battle is joined!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000020_GILGAMESH<tab>Owww! It hurts! It hurts!Enkidu! Your master wants for succor!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000030_GILGAMESH<tab>Fancy some feathers...bird brain?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000040_GILGAMESH<tab>This should cut you down to size...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000050_GILGAMESH<tab>Fight on, Enkidu, my ever faithful─hm!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000060_GILGAMESH<tab>Enkidu! Are the bonds of our friendship so fragile!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000070_GILGAMESH<tab>Not the <var 1A 02 /var>strongest<var 1A 01 /var> of swords, but it should suffice.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000080_GILGAMESH<tab>Gilgamesh is in the mood...for dancing!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000090_GILGAMESH<tab>Divide and conquer, Gilgamesh style!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000100_GILGAMESH<tab>...And now for something truly <var 1A 02 /var>shocking<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000110_GILGAMESH<tab>What's the matter, friend? All tied up?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000120_GILGAMESH<tab>Uh-oh! Someone just woke the dragon...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000130_GILGAMESH<tab>You have some skill, I'll give you that... But Gilgamesh has only just begun to fight!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000140_GILGAMESH<tab>Most impressive! Very well─I, too, shall fight with all my strength!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000150_GILGAMESH<tab>No! The mighty Gilgamesh will not be defeated!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_100010_GILGAMESH<tab>At long last, we meet again on the battlefield! I daresay Enkidu shall come to enjoy our tussles as much as I.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_100020_GILGAMESH<tab><var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var>, however, might not find this one so enjoyable. ...Unless you enjoy getting pounded senseless. Hah!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200010_GILGAMESH<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Me<var 1A 01 /var>? Run away? Hah! I-I was but seeking out a more suitable spot to celebrate my inevitable victory!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200020_GILGAMESH<tab>But enough exposition! Now we fight like men! And ladies! And ladies who dress like men!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200030_GILGAMESH<tab>For Gilgamesh...it is transmogrifying time!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200040_GILGAMESH<tab>The mightiest warrior ever to grace Eorzea stands before you─ by which I mean <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var>, Gilgamesh! Prepare yourself!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300010_GILGAMESH<tab>To think that my full complement of arms would avail me naught...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300020_GILGAMESH<tab>No more high jinks from Gilgamesh. You have my word.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300030_GILGAMESH<tab>The Treaty-Blade, too, I shall return. ...Just as soon as I remember where I hid it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300040_GILGAMESH<tab>Anyway, I yield to your unparalleled puissance! Spare my insignificant life, I beg of you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400010_GILGAMESH<tab>...NOT! Ha, I lied...again! Like a rug! Oh, I kill me!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400020_GILGAMESH<tab>You can take that fusty old blade for all I care! I thirst for <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> power, and naught save the strongest of swords will suffice!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400030_GILGAMESH<tab>Warrior of Light─you have proven a worthy opponent. But I warn you─treasure every moment with your weapon.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400040_GILGAMESH<tab>For as sure as day follows night, the hour will come when I claim it as mine own! Till we meet again!
